:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine| DOCSIS 3.0 Wi-Fi Gateway}} 16x4 DOCSIS 3.0 :{{WiFiCert|WFA73660|11/21/2017}} Internal photos at the FCC show two SKUs with two different 2.4GHz FEMs: *[[Richwave]] RTC7649 (main source) *[[RFMD]] ([[Qorvo]]) RFF8209 (second source) ===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=638 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) ===See also=== [[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] *[[Linksys CG6350]] ✔ *[[Linksys CG7500]] *[[Linksys CM3008]] *[[Linksys CM3016]] *[[Linksys CM3024]] __NOTOC__
